Class Door

java.lang.Object
  Door

public class Door
extends Object

Class Door - a door or portal between two Rooms in an adventure game. This class is part of the "Eternal Destiny" application. "Eternal Destiny" is a text based adventure game. A "Door" represents a door or portal between two locations of the game. It stores a reference to the neighboring room and whether that door or portal is locked. Doors are not locked by default.

Version:
2013.01.22
Author:
Maria Jump, Andrea Siejna
